pageContext.geocode_address: 7525 Marc Drive, Falls Church, VA 22042, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Gear up for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! In this challenge based program, build projects inspired by cool machines close to home such as Gear Cars, Gondolas, Merry-Go-Rounds, and Scissor Lifts. Then build X-Wings, Pod Racers, and AT-AT Walkers from a galaxy far, far away! Learn about BOTH kinds of The Force in this new full-day advanced engineering camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge + Jedi w/ LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration for Summer Camps begins February 7, 2019. Register by May 10 for summer camps and SAVE $8! See the registration page for details.
